document_data.mainbody:
ythrilia was a famous heroine of ancient Thindol. She was responsible for freeing her people from the domination of the yuan-ti.In its history of Thindol, Serpent Kingdoms presents two periods of yuan-ti domination over Thindol an overt rule ended in 293 DR and a covert influence ended in 605 DR. It is unknown which Sythrilia was involved in.
The Hills of Sythrilia in Thindol were named for her by the 1370s DR.
